participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and open-minded, always eager to explore new ideas and experiences.
participant_1.background: I live in a city where the weather is unpredictable. I am headed to university of michigan in the fall. I'm passionate about music and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself. My favorite show is tom and jerry. I like to fly kites.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Caring and family-oriented, enjoys spending time with loved ones while balancing school and personal interests.
participant_2.background: My weekends are for relaxing and spending time with my family. I have been to Japan, and I found the culture to be very different from my own. I'm struggling with my parents' distance, but I'm doing well in school. My mom is a music teacher at the elementary school. I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.

content.text: Hi, what's up?
Hey, not much. I'm just spending time with my family before I go back to school.
Where are you going to school?
I'm going to the University of Michigan in the fall.
Oh, that's great! I'm headed there too.
Really? That's awesome! What are you studying?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about music or business.
Oh, cool. My mom is a music teacher.
That's great! I love music.
Me too! What's your favorite band?
I like a lot of bands, but my favorite is probably The Beatles.
Oh, cool. I like them too.
What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to relax and spend time with my family. I also like to go to concerts and play video games.
That sounds like fun. I like to go to concerts too. I also like to fly kites.
Oh, that's cool. I've never been kite flying before.
It's a lot of fun. You should try it sometime.
I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem.
Well, I should probably get going.
Okay. It was nice talking to you.
You too. Have a good night.
You too.
